content.text:
Kathleen just sent me a photo of Sunshine and Jerome on the couch together and I have to share. Maybe they're slowly becoming friends?!

![two cats, Sunshine and Jerome, on the couch together](&wWBHSaAqpn422mZV2AePuV3iqYJkpdeKCaIh3Pd2f68=.sha256)

#cat ( #cats )
